title: Trinity Rodman Becomes Youngest Player In NWSL History To Reach 10 Goals , 10 Assists
body_text:
Trinity Rodman Becomes Youngest Player In NWSL History To Reach 10 Goals, 10 Assists
Many know Dennis Rodman as the iconic NBA forward and Hall of Fame inductee. However, his daughter is becoming a household name in her respective sport, most recently breaking Sam Kerr‚Äôs National Women‚Äôs Soccer League record.
Trinity Rodman‚Äôs rise in popularity is directly tied to her emergence on the soccer scene, from which she has quickly won the hearts of soccer fanatics. The sports world seemingly looks to make the 20-year-old the next face of U.S. women‚Äôs soccer.
The youngster recently helped Washington Spirit clinch a 3-1 win over the San Diego Wave, outshooting the Wave 15-4 while stopping a two-match NWSL winless stretch Saturday afternoon. The first half went goalless, but Trinity Rodman broke the deadlock in the 55th minute of the second half. Twenty minutes later, the rookie forward helped the Spirits take the lead after assisting her teammate, Ashley Sanchez. This is the Spirit‚Äôs third win of the season.
A work of art üé®
Trinity Rodman sets it up and Ashley Sanchez finishes beautifully to double the Spirit's lead!
üì∫: @CBS pic.twitter.com/adnR1F0h7Y

In the thrilling victory for Washington, the U.S. women‚Äôs national team star scored a goal and added an assist to her name, placing Trinity in the NWSL history books: She became the youngest player in league history with 10 goals and 10 assists.
This outstanding start to the 2023 season sees Rodman boast three goals and two assists in just six games of the campaign. We wouldn‚Äôt be surprised to see her as a starter for the USWNT at this summer‚Äôs Women‚Äôs World Cup. The USWNT starlet is gaining major props across the soccer world, which is astounded by her talent.
‚ÄúCrushing it! D.C. has a special one,‚Äù while another wrote, ‚ÄúI hope she crushes it in the World Cup. She‚Äôs great in the league‚Ä¶‚Äù one fan said.
Fans have even called her a ‚ÄúFuture Hall of Famer,‚Äù suggesting Trinity will also reach the stardom to achieve NWSL Hall of Fame status as her dad did in the NBA.
Fantastic young player!!
‚Äî Robert Beckel (@40_trebor) May 7, 2023
In 2021, Trinity made a sensational debut, becoming the youngest player drafted in the NWSL when Washington Spirit picked her second overall pick. The starlet scored her first professional goal in the first five minutes after coming on as a substitute.
She then helped them win the NWSL Championship. The rookie finished as the second-highest scorer for Spirit that same year, scoring seven goals and assisting seven more in the rookie season.
With the 2nd pick in the 2021 NWSL Draft‚Ä¶@WashSpirit selects: Trinity Rodman from Washington State University
#NWSLDraft pic.twitter.com/77wZDHvxsj
‚Äî National Women‚Äôs Soccer League (@NWSL) January 14, 2021
This would also result in Trinity receiving a well-deserved, record-breaking contract worth $1.1 million from Washington Spirit, making her the highest-paid National Women‚Äôs Soccer League player.
We‚Äôll see Trinity and the Washington Spirit in action on May 11 at Angel City, where they will be looking to continue their undefeated record. Trinity Rodman has started the NWSL in the best possible way, and we can‚Äôt wait to see what she does next.
